      • processConversation

        public java.lang.String processConversation(java.lang.String input)
        The method takes in user input, and builds a response using that input and the method buildChatbotResponse().
        Parameters:
        input - The response the user gives as a String.
        Returns:
        The method returns a response from the input and the buildChatbotResponse() method.

      • buildChatbotResponse

        private java.lang.String buildChatbotResponse()
        The method uses random numbers, to select various words and topics from arrays to construct a question to ask the user.
        Returns:
        The method returns a string made of the randomly selected words.
